plugin.name: System Info
plugin.author: Dan Hoover
plugin.description: A system info dashboard based on http://phpsysinfo.github.io/phpsysinfo/. PLEASE NOTE: If you get an error about "com_dotnet" (usually on Windows), you need to make a change to your php.ini. Find the path of the file in System Snapshot on the UserSpice Dashboard. Add the line "extension=php_com_dotnet.dll" on its own line (without quotes) and restart your server.
